thread.title: Ryno, Sarge and Doctor K: A look back at Mets-Cubs in '84
thread.title_full: Ryno, Sarge and Doctor K: A look back at Mets-Cubs in '84

title: Ryno, Sarge and Doctor K: A look back at Mets-Cubs in '84
text: > Sports Ryno, Sarge and Doctor K: A look back at Mets-Cubs in '84 FILE - In this Aug. 7, 1984 file photo, Chicago Cubs players charge the mound as home plate umpire Fred Brocklander tries to pull New York Mets pitcher Ed Lynch from the melee in the fourth inning of a baseball game in Chicago. The brawl erupted when Cubs batter Keith Moreland charged the mound after being hit by a pitch. No players were ejected. The Mets and Cubs, who are playing each other in Game 3 of the NL Championship Series on Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, had a memorable race for the NL East title in 1984. (AP Photo/John Swart, File)
